item.description:
Healthcare & Life Sciences SIG
New Year's Resolutions
Networking Event

Thursday, January 19, 2012, 5:30-7:30pm
UK Trade & Investment, One Broadway, 7th Floor, Cambridge, MA

 

Didn't you resolve to get out of the office more this year? Here's your chance: Join us to welcome the New Year with colleagues from the life sciences industry. Meet old friends and make new ones in a fun, informal setting. Wine, soda and light snacks will be served.

 

Attendance is guaranteed to help you look younger, live longer, and be healthier in 2012!

 

 

Register http://www.mitforumcambridge.org/events/healthcare-life-sciences-sig-new-years-resolutions-networking-event/

Healthcare & Life Sciences SIG Members: Free
Forum Members (not a member of the Healthcare SIG) $10
Non-Members: $20 Not yet a member? We want you to be! Join Today! http://www.mitforumcambridge.org/membership/about-membership/
Students with valid ID: Free
item.name: Healthcare & Life Sciences SIG New Year's Resolutions Networking Event
